th.name: message_key
th.desc: Unique identifier of the message from the CPS Messages table that this conversation belongs to

th.name: convo_text
th.desc: The conversation that was added as a Follow-Up in CPS

th.name: sent_date
th.desc: Date the conversation was added into the Follow-Up

th.name: sender
th.desc: User who added the Follow-Up about the CPS message

th.name: convo_num
th.desc: A unique identifier for this particular Follow-Up Conversation

th.name: due_date
th.desc: Date the conversation was originally set to be due

th.name: followup_resp
th.desc: The text that was entered as the response to the follow-up in CPS
